title: Login screen art author
body: Who is the author of the login screen arts? Can I find his name or site with his creations, I want to learn to draw in the same artstyle that he did use. Thank you in advance.

replies.body:
One of the main Graphics Motion Designer (aka Login animator) is [Anthony 'PastaBomb' Possobon](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Anthony_%27PastaBomb%27_Possobon).

In terms of the specific art of the login screens, you can find some of the artists referenced on the wiki, just scroll down on the linked page I posted here and you will find 50 or so artist for various artistic sectors for the game (concept art, splash art, promo art)

Hi Tesla! I'm a motion graphics/login animator for champion+champup teams.

Anthony is definitely the OG login screen animator man, but he has been up to other things for a while. Tim Weiser and Adam Oliviera are the ones who animated Elementalist Lux's login screen :)

Awesome, I figured there was a change there since I havent seen much new things from Anthony on his youtube and other art pages, but I only knew him from the references and not anyone knew so thank you for the info. 

If I may ask, what other login animations Tim Weiser and Adam Oliviera have done in the rescent past?

No problem :)
Those guys have been working with the whole Personalization team to bring you the skins login screens this whole year; So they worked on screens like Project Ashe, Ahri, Star Gaurdians, etc, among other things.

The Elementalist Lux one?
The illustration itself was done by Riot Artist [Su-Ke](https://www.artstation.com/artist/sukeart).

However, I'm not sure who's the Motion Graphics guy/gal who animated it. :P
